com.ivj.squirrelgame.ui

Class FxUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Scene
      • com.ivj.squirrelgame.ui.FxUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UI, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class FxUI
extends javafx.scene.Scene
implements UI
    An implementation of UI interface, needed to render the game board with the entities. Based on JavaFX
    Author:
    See Also:
    UI
